name: Thinking Ball
description:
A fast-paced arcade game for PC where you control a thinking emoji rolling forward. Your goal is to navigate through a challenging and obstacle-filled environment, collecting coins and avoiding collisions. Use your keyboard to steer the emoji left and right as you roll forward, and see how far you can go. Prove your skills and see if you have what it takes to become the ultimate rolling emoji master.

Made in 30 minutes using Unity
